title: Advanced Task Killer Free
features: View a comprehensive list of running apps
Shut down apps automatically with a one-touch kill command
Protect running apps from the kill function using the Ignore List
Run Automatic app-kill cycle from every 30 minutes to every 4 hours
Customize app shut-down to maintain optimum performance
description: Terminate running tasks (applications) in memory, free memory and save battery life using Advanced Task Killer App.Advanced Task Killer has the following features:- Double ignore list. Users can ignore apps to avoid being killed by two levels, first is check or uncheck apps in the running list, the second is ignore it and hide it from running list. - Auto kill, it let users to kill apps automatically according a time interval (from half hour to 4 hours or when screen off). - Security level. It provides several security level to show different tasks.Only available in Android
